description: This file defines the Locator class which manages application-wide singleton instances, allowing registration, retrieval, and reset of objects, primarily in the context of a Flutter app. It includes a method to register default implementations of the NotesRepository.

classes.name: Locator
classes.description: A singleton registry for app-wide instances, allowing to store, retrieve, and reset objects by type.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Registers an instance for a specific type, returning the same instance.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a registered instance by type; throws an error if none is found.
